sentences.en: All of these means can directly or indirectly damage crops, forests, and ornamental plantings.
sentences.cn: 所有的这些方法都能直接或间接地为害作物 、 森林和观赏植物.

sentences.en: Anonymous figures strayed along the banks of the ornamental lakes.
sentences.cn: 不知名的人们沿着点缀风景的小湖堤岸悠然徜徉.

sentences.en: Beyond him is a giant ornamental rock, polished and engraved in gold.
sentences.cn: 在他身后,是一块巨大的装饰性石块, 经过打磨,镌刻着金字.

sentences.en: Biotope aquariums represent the natural environments of ornamental fish.
sentences.cn: 生态鱼缸表现出观赏鱼的自然生活环境.

sentences.en: Fall - color trees are important ornamental elements in the exhibition of seasonal variation.
sentences.cn: 秋色叶树种是表现秋季景观的重要造景材料.

sentences.en: It was the little ornamental clock, which was hers.
sentences.cn: 是只当做摆设的小钟, 那是她的东西.

sentences.en: Ornamental vegetables have the vast applied foreground in the ecological agriculture.
sentences.cn: 观赏蔬菜在观光农业中有广阔的应用前景.

sentences.en: That was for the splendours of the recent past ; and for rhetorical and ornamental language.
sentences.cn: 那是对往日繁华的向往以及对于修辞和华丽辞藻的爱好.

sentences.en: The chimney pots are purely ornamental.
sentences.cn: 这些烟囱管帽纯属装饰。

sentences.en: The Corinthian painter's primary ornamental device was the animal frieze.
sentences.cn: 科林斯画家最初的装饰图案是动物形象的装饰带.

sentences.en: The ornamental ironwork lends a touch of elegance to the house.
sentences.cn: 铁艺饰件为房子略添雅致.

sentences.en: The pillars in the centre are purely ornamental.
sentences.cn: 位于中心的那些柱子纯粹是作装饰用的。

sentences.en: The stream was dammed up to form ornamental lakes.
sentences.cn: 溪流用水坝拦挡起来,形成了装饰性的湖泊.

sentences.en: There was a highly ornamental, dark brown carved bench on a raised platform.
sentences.cn: 在高起来的讲坛上,放着一张很精细的, 雕花的淡褐色案桌.

sentences.en: They are not only quite ornamental, but also quite useful.
sentences.cn: 他们不但很具有装饰性, 而且也很实用.

sentences.en: This is for the splendours of the recent past, and for rhetorical and ornamental language.
sentences.cn: 这是由于对往日繁华的向往以及对于修辞和华丽辞藻的爱好.

words.tran_cn: 装饰；[建][服装] 装饰物；教堂用品

trans.tran_en: Something that is ornamental is attractive and decorative
